Starring Mickey Rooney in one of his early performances alongside Anne Nagel and Frank Shields, the film blends themes of childhood, education, poverty, and resilience against the backdrop of small-town America during the Great Depression. Restored and colorized by Colorized Public Domain, this edition brings new life to a long-overlooked drama, making it more accessible and visually engaging for audiences in the United States, Europe, and worldwide.

metadata.Plot: A new schoolteacher arrives in the town of Ainsley, which is in the middle of a milk strike that has caused heated feelings among the local dairy farmers. One of the teacher's new students is a cynical boy who is prone to fighting. When she takes an interest in him, she learns that he lives with his father, a shell-shocked war veteran. Meanwhile, the son of the hard-line dairy owner is pursuing her, despite her resistance to his attentions.
